articles.description: In the upcoming episode of Anupamaa, Anuj gets a chain in his pocket, will this major evidence make Anu believe that her husband is not Samar's murderer?
articles.content: After Samar's death, Vanraj calls Anuj a murderer and accuses him of killing his son. Anu on the other hand is ready to get juistice for her son Samar and fights against Sonu, the reputed politician.… [+114 chars]
